INPUT: $NFT add rule ip filter INPUT ct state new counter accept
FORWARD: $NFT add rule ip filter FORWARD ct state new counter accept

INPUT:
set firewall name INPUT state new enable
set firewall name INPUT action accept
FORWARD:
set firewall name FORWARD state new enable
set firewall name FORWARD action accept

INPUT: $NFT add rule ip6 filter INPUT ct state new counter accept
FORWARD: $NFT add rule ip6 filter FORWARD ct state new counter accept

INPUT:
set firewall ipv6-name INPUT state new enable
set firewall ipv6-name INPUT action accept
FORWARD:
set firewall ipv6-name FORWARD state new enable
set firewall ipv6-name FORWARD action accept
